snippet.title: Angry Birds Action! – Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Angry Birds Action! is now available worldwide!

Play as the heroes from the Angry Birds Movie, and unlock extras in the real world with BirdCodes and Movie Magic!

Download Angry Birds Action!:
http://rov.io/PlayAction_YT

FOLLOW US
https://www.facebook.com/angrybirdsmovie
https://twitter.com/AngryBirds
https://www.instagram.com/angrybirdsofficial
http://www.angrybirdsmovie.com/
